metadata.title: CVE-2022-21637 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:InnoDB). Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.30 and prior. Easilyexploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with networkaccess via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successfulattacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause ahang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS3.1 Base Score 4.9 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.1 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
